text.name: hofBergmann_hint01
text.text: Hof Bergmann beta version, only for promoters and supporters!

text.name: hofBergmann_hint02
text.text: © 2015-2026 LSFM All rights reserved. Support and info about the map at www.lsfarming-mods.com

text.name: closedText_default
text.text: We are closed, come back later!

text.name: action_turnOffGrill
text.text: Button has no function on the grill

text.name: objectStorageGrainGrist_infoText
text.text: Attention! Only for grain grist bags

text.name: object_objectStorageGrainGrist
text.text: Storage area for grain grist bags

text.name: object_objectStorageBakeryWoodChips
text.text: Storage area for wood chip bags

text.name: animal_duckGrowthStage0Description
text.text: Ducklings do not lay eggs yet. They can be raised or sold.

text.name: animal_duckGrowthStage1Description
text.text: Ducks provide eggs which can be sold or processed in productions.

text.name: animal_poultryFoodDescription
text.text: Poultry requires grain and water to produce. Note: Some barns have automatic water supply.

text.name: animal_rabbitGrowthStage0Description
text.text: Baby rabbits are the youngest stage and are born by a doe.

text.name: animal_rabbitGrowthStage1Description
text.text: A young rabbit can be raised.

text.name: animal_rabbitGrowthStage2Description
text.text: Female rabbits (does) can reproduce or be sold.

text.name: animal_rabbitGrowthStage3Description
text.text: The buck is the male rabbit. Can only be bought or sold.

text.name: animal_rabbitBeddingDescription
text.text: Rabbits require straw for comfortable bedding.

text.name: animal_rabbitFoodDescription
text.text: Rabbits need a varied diet including hay and lettuce. Water is supplied automatically.

text.name: animal_descriptionGooseProfitGrowthStage0
text.text: Young geese can be fattened and sold for profit.

text.name: animal_descriptionGooseProfitGrowthStage1
text.text: Geese can be bred and sold for profit.

text.name: animal_descriptionGooseFeed
text.text: They can be fed wheat, barley, oats, millet or sunflowers. Water is supplied automatically.

text.name: animal_descriptionGooseReproduction
text.text: Geese reach sexual maturity at 10 months. Incubation time is one month.

text.name: animal_descriptionFoal
text.text: Foals need a lot of care to grow into adult horses.

text.name: animal_descriptionCatFeed
text.text: Cats require fresh food daily. Water is supplied automatically.

text.name: animal_catGrowthStage0Description
text.text: Kittens grow into adult cats and reach maturity at 8 months.

text.name: animal_catGrowthStage1Description
text.text: Cats can have kittens. Gestation period is 2 months.

text.name: function_hayRack
text.text: A hay rack is used to dry mown grass in a traditional way. It can dry up to 8000 L of grass.

text.name: message_hayRackSeasons
text.text: Hay drying is not possible in autumn and winter!

text.name: message_unloadAnimalConfirmation
text.text: Do you want to unload %d animals (%s) at %s?

text.name: message_animalTooYoung
text.text: This animal is too young for slaughter. A minimum age of %s is required!

text.name: message_animalTooOld
text.text: This animal is too old for slaughter. Only animals up to an age of %s are accepted!

text.name: message_fieldDisableWinter
text.text: Garden beds are not available during winter!

text.name: message_animalTooYoungRoast
text.text: This animal is too young for grilling. A minimum age of %s is required!

text.name: message_animalTooOldRoast
text.text: This animal is too old for grilling. Only animals up to an age of %s are accepted!

text.name: enterText_sittingTable
text.text: Sit down and take a break!

text.name: enterText_sleepSofa
text.text: Lie down on sofa and take a nap!

text.name: function_animalLifter
text.text: Lifting and transport device for cows, sheep/goats and pigs

text.name: function_compostSpreader
text.text: Compost spreaders are used to increase field yields.

text.name: function_transportCart
text.text: Small transport cart for industrial goods. Warning! No road approval, use only on company property.

text.name: function_transportCartAnimal
text.text: Small transport cart for up to 20 geese. Warning! No road approval.

text.name: function_emule250E
text.text: Small industrial electric tractor. Warning! No road approval, use only on company property.

text.name: warning_speziEmpty
text.text: Warning: Spezi is empty, get a new one if you want to drink more!

text.name: function_speziCrate
text.text: A crate of Paulaner Spezi for quenching your thirst.

text.name: function_woodChipsSack
text.text: Wood chips can be used for smoking.

text.name: function_wineBarrel
text.text: Barrel for filling and transporting grape juice or wine.

text.name: function_wineBarrelPallet
text.text: Barrels for filling and transporting grape juice or wine.

text.name: function_fishBox
text.text: Required for transporting fish caught at the lake.

text.name: function_fishBoxFillable
text.text: Used to transport smoked fish. Special feature: deposit item.

text.name: function_animalSack
text.text: Transport sack for small animals such as chickens, ducks and rabbits.

text.name: function_animalWoodBox
text.text: Portable crate for transporting poultry and rabbits.

text.name: function_grapeHarvesterHB
text.text: The grape harvester/defoliator was specially designed for the Hof Bergmann map. Harvesting uses suction technology, defoliation uses air blasting.

text.name: function_oldAnimalTrailer
text.text: Supported animals: cow (1) or calves (4), pig (1) or piglets (7), sheep/goat (1) or lamb (4), chickens (12), geese (9). Special feature: trailer can be controlled directly by the player.

text.name: animal_descriptionBullFeed
text.text: Bulls like grass, hay and TMR.

text.name: animal_descriptionBullReproduction
text.text: Bulls that are healthy and older than 12 months can reproduce.

text.name: animal_descriptionBoarReproduction
text.text: Boars that are healthy and older than 8 months can reproduce.

text.name: animal_descriptionBoarFeed
text.text: Boars eat nearly anything. You can feed them corn, wheat, barley, canola, sunflowers, soybeans, potatoes, sorghum and sugar beets.

text.name: animal_descriptionRamReproduction
text.text: Rams that are healthy and older than 5 months can reproduce.

text.name: animal_descriptionStallionFeed
text.text: Stallions like hay, oat and sorghum.

text.name: animal_descriptionStallionProfit
text.text: Stallions can be sold for a profit.

text.name: animal_descriptionStallionReproduction
text.text: Stallions that are healthy and older than 36 months can reproduce.

text.name: animal_cattleF_GS01
text.text: This is a female calf. It will become a productive cow one day .

text.name: animal_cattleF_GS02
text.text: This is a female weaner. Weaners already eat solid food.

text.name: animal_cattleF_GS04
text.text: This is a fully grown cow.

text.name: animal_cattleM_GS01
text.text: This is a male calf. It will grow into a productive bull one day .

text.name: animal_cattleM_GS02
text.text: This is a male weaner. Weaners already eat solid food.

text.name: animal_cattleM_GS04
text.text: This bull is fully grown. It can be sold for profit.

text.name: animal_ChickensF_GS01Description
text.text: This is a female chick. It will one day grow into a productive laying hen.

text.name: animal_ChickensF_GS02Description
text.text: This is a female chick. It will one day grow into a productive laying hen.

text.name: animal_ChickensF_GS03Description
text.text: This is a young hen. It will soon start laying eggs.

text.name: animal_ChickensF_GS04Description
text.text: This is a fully grown hen.

text.name: animal_ChickensM_GS01Description
text.text: This is a male chick. It will one day grow into a productive laying hen.

text.name: animal_ChickensM_GS02Description
text.text: This is a male chick. It will one day grow into a productive laying hen.

text.name: animal_ChickensM_GS04Description
text.text: This is a fully grown rooster.

text.name: animal_GoatsF_GS04Description
text.text: This is a fully grown doe.

text.name: animal_GoatsM_GS04Description
text.text: This is a fully grown buck.

text.name: animal_SheepF_GS04Description
text.text: This is a fully grown ewe.

text.name: animal_SheepM_GS04Description
text.text: This is a fully grown ram.

text.name: animal_PigsF_GS03Description
text.text: This is a young sow. She will soon farrow for the first time.

text.name: animal_PigsF_GS04Description
text.text: This is a fully grown sow.

text.name: animal_PigsM_GS02Description
text.text: This is a young Porker. It can be sold for profit after fattening.

text.name: animal_PigsM_GS03Description
text.text: This is a young boar. It can be sold for profit.

text.name: animal_PigsM_GS04Description
text.text: This is a fully grown boar.
